eng: if we have a good reason to talk to her, she's always ready to talk.
darija_ar: ألا عندنا ساباب معقول باش نهضرو معاها, هيا راه ديما مستاعدّا تهضر.
transl: We have a reasonable chance to talk to her, she is always willing to chat.

eng: A female voice who sometimes comment on what I'm doing.
darija_ar: صوت ديال لعيالات هوا لي مرّا مرّا كايعلّق علا داكشي اللي كاندير.
transl: The voice of the girls is what keeps repeating what I did.

eng: I'm like most people, I don't believe in God except five minutes from the end
darija_ar: أنا بحال بزّاف تنّاس, ماكانأمن ب الله إلّا خمسا تدّقايق قبل النيهايا
transl: Like many people, I only believe in God five minutes before the deadline.

eng: I don't know anything about airplanes, but I'm terrified every time I fly
darija_ar: ماتانفهم التا زفتا ف الطيّارات والاكين كانتخلع كولّا مرّا تانطير ف السما
transl: He doesn't understand anything about planes, he gets scared every time he flies.

eng: Just go away and think about your priorities and what you want to achieve
darija_ar: وا هير سير أُ فكّر فل أولاويات ديالك أُ أش بغيتي تحقّق
transl: Wow, that's great! Think about your priorities and what you want to achieve.

eng: It's getting hot in here and we probably have another 15 minutes to wait
darija_ar: لحال كايسخون هنايا أُ غاليبان باقي خسّنا تسنّاو شي 15 دقيقا خرا
transl: They are the only ones left here, we lost, let's wait for another 15 minutes.

eng: The idea is to see what was done, and to understand why the elevator broke down again
darija_ar: لفيكرا هيا نشوفو أش الدار, أُ نفهمو علاش السانسور خسر مرّا خرا
transl: Let's go tomorrow to see what's happening at home, to understand why the sensor lost signal again.

eng: If he's the one they sent to repair it, it might be something simple
darija_ar: ألا كان هوا اللي صيفتو باش إصاوبو, إقدر تكون شي حاجة ساهلا
transl: If he is the one who caused it, it could be an easy thing to fix.

eng: I understand that, but still, 12/20 for 14 pages, I don't think it's enough.
darija_ar: فهمت هادشي, والاكين كيمّا كان لحال, 1ء/ء0 ل 14 لصفحا, ماكانضنّش كافيا.
transl: I understood this, but it's like it was alone, from page 10 to 14, it wasn't enough.

eng: Sorry I thought we were organizing it, are you happy for it to be another night?
darija_ar: سمح ليا, صحابني كنّا منضّمينها, واش غاتكون ناشط ألا درناها فليلا خرا?
transl: Excuse me, my friends were organizing it, will it still be active or did we cancel it last night?

eng: Work places also need to provide showers and changing rooms
darija_ar: لبلايس ديال لخدما تاهوما خاسهوم إكون فيهوم دوشات أُ بيوتا ديال تبدال
transl: Employees should always be provided with appropriate training and development opportunities.

eng: you can't speak French and expect us to speak English.
darija_ar: مايمكنش ليك تهدر بل فرانكايس أُ تسنّانا حنا نهدرو ب ل أنڭلايس.
transl: You can't speak French to us, we speak English.

eng: We can have the main part of the party outside as the weather is so warm
darija_ar: إمكن لينا نديرو الطرف لموهيم من لحفلا علا برّا حيت لجوو سخون
transl: Maybe we can have a picnic instead of going to the party since the weather is hot.

eng: But if the money's a problem, then why are we having a home-cooked dinner.
darija_ar: والاكين ألا كانو لفلوس هوما لموشكيل, إدان علاش عندنا عشا مڭادّ فدّار.
transl: If they had money, they would have bought a car, that's why we have dinner at home.

eng: Or is it a technique for her to come and buy us some meat?
darija_ar: أُلا هيا هي شي طاريقا ديالها باش تجي أُتشري لينا شويا تلّحم?
transl: She's just going out to buy us some meat, right?

eng: I think I was supposed to be attending, too, except it doesn't appear on my schedule.
darija_ar: كانضنّ كان خسّ نحضر تانا, هير هوا ماطلعاتش ليا فل برناماج ديالي.
transl: I think he was upset that we didn't attend again, he hasn't contacted me about my program.

eng: Usually I work over Aid because I live in Marrakech close to the office
darija_ar: عاداتان كانخدم نهار لعيد حيت أنا ساكن ف مرّاكش قريب ل بيرو
transl: I usually work on the day of the holiday because I live in Marrakech close to the pyramids.

eng: Do you live in Casablanca or do your family live in another part of the country?
darija_ar: واش نتا ساكن ف كازا أُلا لعاإلا ساكنا فشي بلاسا خرا فلبلاد?
transl: Are you living in Casablanca or somewhere else abroad?

eng: I ve got so much to do today, you know there are tight deadlines for that project
darija_ar: عندي بزّاف مايدار ليوما, راك عارف لوقت مزيير ف هاد ل پروجت
transl: I have a lot to do today, you know, there's too little time for this project.

eng: My doctor has given me some pills to calm me down but they don't seem to be working.
darija_ar: طبيب ديالي عتاني شي فانيد باش يكالميني ساعا بان ليا ما خدّامش
transl: My doctor prescribed a medication for me to take before calling me an hour ago because I am not feeling well.

eng: They're nesting over there and it looks as if the babies will hatch out soon.
darija_ar: راهوم معشّشين هنا أُ بان ليا قريب يخرجو لفراخ ديالهوم من لبيض
transl: They are living here until their chicks hatch from the eggs.

eng: But it smelt so badly of old people there - I'm glad to be home
darija_ar: والاكين كانت ريحا ديال شرّاف عاطيا تمّا - هامدولّاه رجعت ل الدار
transl: The weather was very hot, giving a sense of suffocation, so they went back home.

eng: But now this Anya seems to be getting in there instead
darija_ar: والاكين دابا هاديك أنيا كاتبان ليا هيا اللي ولّات باتشد هاد لبلاصّصا
transl: But now those eyes are writing to me that she is the one who left this place.

eng: I just want to take a long hot shower and have a cup of tea.
darija_ar: بغيت غير نضرب شي تدويشا سخونا أُ نشرب شي كوييسّ ديال أتاي.
transl: I want to have a light meal instead of going out, let's drink some good tea.

eng: My poor baby, he was all wet all day long, I hope you didn't catch cold.
darija_ar: اللاه علا حبيبتي مسكينا, بقات فازڭا نهار كامل, علّاه مايكونش ضربك لبرد.
transl: Oh God, my poor darling, she stayed outside all day, hopefully she won't catch a cold.

eng: And you know how much I like butter and cheese and tasty foods
darija_ar: أُ راك عارف شحال عزيزا عليا الزبدا أُ لفورماج أُ لماكلا لبنينا
transl: You know how much I love butter and cheese in my meals.

eng: But there's still some space for some more berries if you like.
darija_ar: والاكين مازال شويا ديال لبلاصّا ل شي شويا ديال التوت إلا بغيتي.
transl: The store still has a little bit of strawberries left if you want.

eng: Besides, I have a big cold, so I'd better cover for myself.
darija_ar: أُ من فوق هادشي, ضاربني لبرد بزّاف, إدان حسن ليا نغطّي راسّي.
transl: From above this, it's very cold, I wish I had something to cover my head.

eng: And I might just forget what you just said about my credit card.
darija_ar: أُ نقدر نسا هادشي لي يالّاه ڭولتي علا ل كارت بانكاير ديالي.
transl: I can't believe you just mentioned my favorite pancake recipe.

eng: And thank you for the chocolate I took out of your bag whilst you weren't looking.
darija_ar: أُ شوكران علا شوكلاط اللي خديت ليك من الصاك فاش ماكنتيش كاتشوف.
transl: Thank you for the chocolate I got for you from the store when you weren't looking.

eng: PRETENDING to want to know how my day was, how I felt, what I was looking for in life?
darija_ar: كاتمتّل أنّاك باغي تعرف كيداز نهاري, كي كانحسّ, علاياش كانقلّب ف لحايات?
transl: You're curious to know how my days go, how I feel, and why I look lost in thoughts?

eng: Look, I think you should think about what you want from your psychiatrist.
darija_ar: سمعي, كانضن أنّاهو خاصّ تفكري أشنو بغيتي من عند طبيب نفسي ديالك.
transl: Listen, I think you should consider what you want from your psychiatrist.

eng: I know it is difficult for you as fear and logic don't always go hand in hand
darija_ar: عرفت أنّاها سعيبا ب نيسبا ليك حيت لخلعا أُ لوجيك ماكايتجمعوش عاداتان
transl: I understood that it might be difficult for you because its logic doesn't match your habits.

eng: Let's go for a walk and climb that hill over there.
darija_ar: يالّاه نمشيو نضربو شي دويرا أُ نطلعو ف ديك لكوديا اللي تمّا.
transl: Let's go for a walk and have a picnic in the countryside this weekend.

eng: This is my first time flying and I'm not sure what to expect.
darija_ar: هادي أوال مرا غادي نسافر ف طيّارا أُ مامتأكدش أش غادي نمتواقع.
transl: This is the first time we will be traveling by plane, so I'm not sure what to expect.

eng: Then we can try to call for help by building a musical instrument.
darija_ar: من بعد إمكن لينا نحاولو نطلبو لموساعادا ب نقادو ألا ديال موسيقا.
transl: After that, maybe we can try to ask for help from music experts.

eng: Wow, I thought you would tell me that we need the basics!
darija_ar: ووو, كنت كاندن واش غادي تڭول ليا بلي حنا ماحتاجين لحاجات لموهيما!
transl: Wow, I was wondering if you were going to tell me that we don't need anything for the party!

eng: Oh and no I ve not been drinking, not even tequila with a worm in the bottom of the bottle!
darija_ar: أُه أُ أنا ماكنتش كانشرب, حتا تيكيلا معا دودا ف قاع لقارعا!
transl: Oh no, I never used to drink, not even tequila with Douda at the bottom of the street!

eng: It will take us hours to get back the way we come
darija_ar: غادي ياخاد لينا بزاف ديال لواقت باش نرجعو من تريق ليجينا منها
transl: He will take a lot of time so that we can return from the trip we took from it.

eng: If you want to buy a bottle of wine and drink it secretly, buy a nice bottle
darija_ar: إلا بغيتي تشري قارعا ديال شراب أُ تشرابها بتخبيا, شري قارعا زوينا
transl: If you want to buy a bottle of drink to hide it, buy a nice bottle

eng: I think he should have been in the seminars for kids while he's still in town
darija_ar: كانضن بلي كان غايكون ف ناداوات ديال دراري فاش كان باقي فلميدنا
transl: I think he will be in trouble if he stays in the classroom.

eng: Or these are the six little pistachio macaroons you took from the snack bar.
darija_ar: أُلا هادو هوما ستا ديال لحلاوي سغيرا بلفوستاق ألي خديتها مان سناكك.
transl: These are the best little sweets I've had since I took them as a snack.

eng: Now we can compare the efficiency of white bread and the black bread on these ducks
darija_ar: دابا نقدرو نقارنو لكافاأ ديال لخوبز لبياد أُ لخوبز لكحال علا لباط
transl: Now we can compare the quality of bread from the bakery to the quality of homemade bread.

eng: It is empty calories, which makes the ducks fat and more likely to sink.
darija_ar: راه خاوي من سوعورات لحارارييا, كايخالي لباط غليد أُ كايتعاراد بزاف لغاراق
transl: He is absent from school for a long time, he keeps making excuses and avoiding the subject.

eng: I think the bread sinks and creates a messy pond - so I hear anyway
darija_ar: كاندن لخوبز كايغرق أُ كاخالي ضايا خايبا - داكشي لي سمعت بعدا
transl: My cousin is drowning in debt - that's what I heard.

eng: Give me your e-mail, I'll send you the ad for our next gig
darija_ar: عطيني إ-مايل ديالك, غادي نسيفت ليك ل إشهار ديال لحافلا جايا ديالنا
transl: Give me your email, I will send you the advertisement for our upcoming event.

eng: apart from that little transport problem, how are your relations with your boss?
darija_ar: منغير لموشكيلا السغيرا ت ترانسپورت, كيفاش لعالاقا ديالك دايرا معا شف ديالك?
transl: Without using public transportation, how do you manage your daily commute with your work schedule?

eng: I have to make the time up tomorrow, so I'll be late home from work
darija_ar: أيخسني نردّ لوقت غدّا, داكشي علاش غادي نرجاع لدار معاتال من لخدما.
transl: Let's meet tomorrow, that's why I will go back home early from work.

eng: it might mean we are a bit late as I have to work late
darija_ar: هادشي إقدر يعني بلي تعطال ديالنا شوييا حيت غادي إخاسني نخدام معتال
transl: This could mean that our break will be a bit longer as it will help me relax from work.

eng: And the bartender's an idiot, so you could always hire him as a jester!
darija_ar: أُ سارباي هبيل, داكشي علاش إمكان ليك ديما تخدمو بحال شي موهرّيج!
transl: Oh, you're so talented, that's why you always work like a magician!

eng: I know a man who knows a man who knows a busker, who might be able to come along and play a bit of guitar.
darija_ar: كانعراف واهد الراجل كايعراف راجل كايعراف موسيقي, اللي إقدر إجي ويضراب لڭيتار.
transl: He knows how to play guitar, the man knows how to play music.

eng: I can't think of anything worse than a rubbish band playing all night
darija_ar: مانقدرش نفاكار فشي حاجة خيب من جوق ديا زبال كايغنّيو الليل كامل
transl: We can't ignore something disappointing, it's like a garbage dump that sings all night.

eng: Actually it's an experimental group, they combine a lot of music styles!
darija_ar: صاراحا هادي مجموعا يالاه كاتجرّب, كاتجماع بين بزاف ديال لأنواع ديال لموسيقا!
transl: This band is amazing, they experiment and combine many types of music!

eng: I'm thinking to live in Dakhla for the rest of my life, it was a life changing experience
darija_ar: كانفكّر نعيش ف ضاخلا هادشي ليبقا فهياتي, كانت تاجريبا بدلات ليا حياتي
transl: I used to think about living in a different way than what is happening in my life, it was like trying on different outfits for my life.

eng: She told me that if we cannot get the money back then I'll need to find the 1 billion euros myself.
darija_ar: ڭالت ليا إلا ماردّيناش لفلوس غادي إخسّني نضبّر أنا علا ماليار الراسي.
transl: She told me that if we don't pay the money, she will take legal action against me.

eng: If we cannot get the money back, can you give me 1 billion to pay back to the company?
darija_ar: إلا ماقدرناش نرجّعو لفلوس, واش إمكان ليك تعطيني ماليار باش نخلّص شاريكا?
transl: We can't refund the money, can you give me a billion to settle the deal?

eng: maybe we should ask a sorcerer to help us to cast a spell on my boss
darija_ar: إمكان أيخاسنا نشوفو شي موشعويد إعاونا نديرو شي حاجة ل شف ديالي"
transl: Maybe we can find a solution together to do something for my health.

eng: Could you go for me and find the best sorcerer for less than 1 billion euros?
darija_ar: واش مومكين تمشي علا قابلي أُتلقا أحسان سحّار بقلّ من مليار إوروس?
transl: Is it possible to go to a meeting to meet a magician for less than a billion euros?

eng: At least that means that somebody might wonder where you are and come looking
darija_ar: هادشي كايعني علّأقال بيلا شي واحاد غادي يقالاب عليك ويجي يساوال عليك
transl: This means that if someone says something bad about you, they will come and confront you.

eng: I am quite happy here and the staff are friendly but sometimes I don't like the food
darija_ar: أنا فارحان هنا أُ لمووادافين درايفين والاكين ماكاتعجبنيش لماكلا هنا مرّا مرّا
transl: I am happy here with my friends, but I don't like the food here at all.

eng: I also did some training while working in a famous bar in London
darija_ar: أُ دارت شحال من تادريبات منين كانت خادام فبار ماشهور ف لوندون
transl: The house did many exercises when it was working in a bar last month in London.

eng: How about iPads instead of paper note books?
darija_ar: أُ أش بان ليك ف أجهيزا ديال إپاد بلاست موداكيرا ديال لوراق
transl: I want to buy an iPad without a cover or screen protector.

eng: I think if you fillet it, then fry it lightly and serve with a lemon and olive oil
darija_ar: كانضن إلا قليتيها, قليها شوييا أُ حاتها معا لحامض معا زيت زيتون
transl: If you find it salty, add a little lemon juice and olive oil.

eng: I'd much rather just laze here in the sun and perhaps read a chapter or two of my book.
darija_ar: كانفادال نتاكا هنا فشامش أُ مومكين ناقرا فاصل ولا جوج من كتابي
transl: You can study here in peace, there are no distractions or noise to disturb you.

eng: All he does is put us down, and remind us that he's intellectually superior
darija_ar: لحاجا لواحيدا لي كايدير هيا كايطيّح منّا, وي فكّرنا أنّاهو موتقّاف علينا
transl: There's someone who is always criticizing us, and we think he's judging us.

eng: However, now that he's aware of his power, he also goes after my friends because they're girls
darija_ar: والاكين دابا منين عراف لقووا ديالو, راه تابع سحاباتي حيت هوما بنات
transl: And where did he know his whereabouts from, as he follows my clouds since they are girls.

eng: It's true that Marion was always the little girl of everyone... kind of like your Oliver, wasn't she?
darija_ar: بساح ماريون ديما كانت لبانت سغيرا ديال كولشي... بحال أُليڤر ديالك, ياك?
transl: In Marion's courtyard, there was always a little bit of everything... like your olive tree, right?

eng: At your age living in a world of Manga and cartoons are pathetic
darija_ar: ف عامراك أُتعيش ف عالام لمانڭا أُ روسوم لموتاحاريكا أمر موتير لشافاقا
transl: In Amerika, you live in a big house with a swimming pool and a sports car in the driveway.

eng: I spend weekends studying birds and looking for rare species
darija_ar: كانداوز لعوتلات ديال لخار سيمانا فقرايا ديال تويور أُكانقلاب علا أنواع ناديرا
transl: The traditional dishes of the region will be showcased at the food festival next week featuring a variety of local delicacies.

eng: Yes, I was in Sri Lanka recently and saw some wonderful birds and animals
darija_ar: أه, كانت ف صري لانكا غير موأخاران أُشافت شي طيور أُحاياونات واعرا
transl: Oh, when I was in Sri Lanka, I only saw some exotic birds and animals.

eng: Anything with hot water, although I'm not a fan of mint.
darija_ar: أيّ حاجا معا لما سخون, واخا أنا ماشي من الناس ديال ناعناع
transl: Anything is better when it's warm, and I'm not one of the fickle people.

eng: Do you want crisps, nuts or anything to nibble?
darija_ar: واش بغيتي راقاإق ديال بطاطا أُ لموكسارات ولا شي حاجا خرا تعاضها?
transl: Do you want a plate of fries with ketchup or something else to go with it?

eng: Maybe when it is my party you can come and enjoy something new
darija_ar: مومكين منين تكون لحافلا ديالي تاقدار تجي أُ تستمتع بشي حاجا جديدا
transl: It's not possible for me to be always available to come and enjoy something new

eng: I don't like Breton, all that moving slowly around in a line or circle - very dull
darija_ar: ماكنبغيش برتون, ڭاع داكشي كايمشي بشوييا فخاط ولا داإرا - موميلا بزاف
transl: I don't want trouble, that thing is going a little too far and unnecessary - it's not worth it.

eng: It is a song by Lesley Gore from the 1960's, you should listen to it on youtube
darija_ar: راها أُغنييا ديال لسي ڭور من الستّينات, خاساك تسماع ليها ف يوتوب
transl: It's a song from the 60s, you should listen to it on YouTube.

eng: If we are doing this at my house, I can not invite over 15 people
darija_ar: إلا درناها ف داري, ماغاديش نقدار نعاياط علا كتار من 15 واحاد
transl: If we study it at home, we won't be able to answer more than 15 questions.

eng: So I suggest we meet once a week for six months
darija_ar: هادشي علاش غادي نقتارح نتلاقاو مرّا ف سيمانا لمودا ديال ستّ شهور
transl: That's why we should suggest meeting once in a week for the next six months.

eng: Could you say you're getting back from Los Angeles and your plane's been delayed?
darija_ar: واش تقدار تڭول بيلا غادي ترجاع من لوس أنڭلس, ولا طيارتاك تعاتلات?
transl: Can you tell me if you will return from Los Angeles by bus or by plane?

eng: but I'm wondering if it wouldn't be better to stay here quietly by the pool
darija_ar: والاكين كانتساءل واش ماشي حسن نبقا هي هنا مرتاح حدا لا پيسسين
transl: And sometimes I wonder if it's not better to stay here where it's peaceful rather than going out.

eng: Maybe tomorrow I'll have a little more courage to go rock climbing with you
darija_ar: مومكين غدا غادي تكون عندي شوييا ديال شاجاعا باش نتسالاق معاك الصوخور
transl: It's not possible tomorrow, I will have a little bit of work to do so we can meet for lunch.

eng: Or, we could go now, while you haven't had enough time to change your mind!
darija_ar: أُلا نقدرو نمشيو دابا ماحداك مازال معنداكش لواقت باش تبادال راإي ديالك!
transl: We can't go now, nobody is ready yet to change their mind!

eng: Who knew that lifts breaking down could be a good thing!
darija_ar: شكون ليكان كايعراف بلي ل أسسنسور إخسار إقدر تكون شي حاجة مزيانا!
transl: Who knew that losing weight could be a good thing!

eng: Do you know anywhere I could hold it, like a bar or club?
darija_ar: واش كاتعراف شي بلاسا فين نقدار نديرها, بحال شي بار أُلا نادي?
transl: Do you know of a place where we can hang out, like a bar or a club?

eng: I'm going to work in Chanel and resign from this rotten food job!
darija_ar: غادي نخدم ف شانل أُغادي نستاقل من هاد لخدما ديال لماكلا لخامجا
transl: I will work on the project so that we can benefit from this food service.

eng: First the train was late so when it came it was full and there were no seats left
darija_ar: أوالان, تعاتال تران, أُ منين وسال كان عامار أُ ماكانوش بلايس خاويين
transl: Right now, she's upset, wondering where he was, whether he was with friends or alone.

eng: I was very scared, too, when I started getting on the plane ten years ago
darija_ar: كنت خايف بزاف تا أنا منين بديت كانركاب طايارا قبال عشر سنين
transl: I was very scared when I started flying as a pilot ten years ago.

eng: If it is yours, I'm afraid we don't allow dogs in our bar for hygiene reasons
darija_ar: إلا كان ديالك, راه ماكانسماحوش بلكلاب حنا ف لحانا لأسباب ديال ناضافا
transl: If it were up to you, we wouldn't let dogs in our house for hygiene reasons.

eng: as they say, if you don't like living here, then go live elsewhere
darija_ar: كيف كايڭولو, إلا كانتي ماكاتبغيش تعيش هنا, سير عيش ف بلاسا خرا
transl: He says how it is, but you don't want to live here, go live somewhere else

eng: Yeah, I think I'm gonna wear a nice solid gold tiara, with a lot of diamonds!
darija_ar: أه, كانضن غادي نلباس تاج من دهاب لخاليص, معا بزاف ديال ألماس
transl: Oh, I think we will wear a crown made of gold and diamonds, along with many diamonds.

eng: I was talking about dessert, but I think I'm gonna make it easier for you
darija_ar: كانت كانهدار علا لحالوا, والاكين كانضن بيلا غادي نخالي لأمر ساهل ليك
transl: She was independent, otherwise she would have thought that we would make things easy for her.

eng: an excellent way to improve work relationships is to organise an informal gathering
darija_ar: من طوروق لمومتازا باش نحاسنو عالاقات لخادما هوا تانضيم ليقاء ماشي راسمي
transl: From now on, let's improve our relationship with the server so that he feels like part of the team, not just a formal employee.

eng: For example, if one of the team-members has something to celebrate
darija_ar: ماتالان إلا كان عند شي حاد من لفرقا شي حاجا كايحتافال بيها
transl: Don't worry unless there is a serious issue, something will be taken care of.

eng: Find a good reason for a party between colleagues, set it up, and invite him!
darija_ar: قلّب علا سباب واجيه لشي زردا بين زومالاء, بلانيها, أُ عياط عليه
transl: He started an argument and ended up in a fight with some guys in the neighborhood, he got beaten up.

eng: I hope you are making the most of the bank holidays this week to change your ideas
darija_ar: كانتمانا تاستافاد ل أقصا حاد من لعوتا هاد سيمانا باش تبادال أفكارك
transl: We should meet at least once this week to exchange ideas.

eng: please could you just sear the beef in a pan and put it on to slow roast
darija_ar: عافاك, واش تقدار تحامار لحام لبڭار فلماقلا أُ تحاطو ف إتحمّر بشويا
transl: Please, can you grill the meat a bit more until it turns slightly red in the barbecue?

eng: We will have an exam, if that is what you mean, next week on Thursday
darija_ar: غادي يكون عاندنا متيحان, إلا كان هادشي ليكاتقساد, سيمانا جايا نهار لخميس
transl: We will have a test, otherwise this will be confusing, next week on Thursday.

eng: the shopper paid with cash to avoid credit card fees
darija_ar: لكليان خلسّ شاسه باش مايديوش ليها لبانكا شي داراإب إلا ستاعمل كارتا
transl: Tell him secretly so that the bank doesn't know anything about it, just make a card.

eng: let's plan a movie night soon, i've got a list of must watch films
darija_ar: تانختارو شي اليلا نتفرجو فيها فشي فيلم, راني موجد ليستا ديال لفيلمات
transl: You guys choose a movie to watch tonight, I'm not up to date with the latest films.

eng: i've been trying to drink more water, but i cant get off coffee
darija_ar: شحال و أنا كانجرب نشرب كتر ديال لما, والاكين ماقدرتش نحييد لقهوا
transl: I tried to drink a lot of water, but I couldn't resist the coffee.

eng: i wish i could go back in time and relive those carefree summer vacations
darija_ar: ماكرهتش نرجع بلوقت و نعاود نعيش عوتال سيف فين راسّي كيكون خاوي
transl: I don't want to go back in time and relive the same struggles where my head will feel empty.

eng: have you tried adulting but ended up scrolling through social media instead?
darija_ar: عمرك جربتي تخدم والاكين لقيتي راسّك فلخر كادور ف سوكيال مديا ?
transl: Have you ever tried working with difficult people in the media industry?

eng: let's plan a day to relive our childhood favorites
darija_ar: يالّاه نبلانيو نهار نديرو فيه ڭاع دكشي لي كان كيعجبنا ف سخور
transl: Let's plan a day to do what we like in the countryside.

eng: i wish i had a personal assistant to tackle all my adult responsibilities
darija_ar: ماكرهتش كو كان عندي موسّاعيد شاخسّي يقدي ليا ڭاع ل أخراد ديالي
transl: I didn't hate it, but I had other important appointments that prevented me from going out.

eng: do you ever wonder if our pets have secret parties when we're not around?
darija_ar: ماعمرك تخايلتي بلي حاياوانات ديالنا كيكونو كيديرو حفلات سيريا فاش ماكانكونوش ?
transl: Have you ever imagined that our pets would throw parties when we're not around?

eng: i wish i had a time machine to give advice to my younger self
darija_ar: ماكرهكتش تكون عندي شي ماشين نرجع بيها لوقت باش نعتي ناسّاإح لراسّي
transl: I don't mind having a car to go back in time to teach people a lesson.

eng: i wish i could absorb the knowledge from a book by touching it
darija_ar: ماكرهتش كون كنت نقدر نمتاسّ لماعلومات ديال شي كتاب خي بموجاراد مانقيسّو
transl: I didn't hate being able to delve into the information of a book, but unfortunately we didn't finish it.

eng: i'm convinced that a power nap can solve most problems
darija_ar: أنا مقتانع بلي إلا دربتها ب نعسّا ڭاع لماشاكيل لي عندي أيمشيو
transl: I am convinced that if I train them with determination, the skills I have will improve.

eng: i'm convinced that our family gatherings are like comedy shows
darija_ar: أنا مقتانعا بلي عاإلتنا فاش كيتجمعو كيوليو بحا شي فرقا دياك مسراح
transl: I am convinced that when our family gathers, it feels like a theater performance.

eng: remember when we would team up to create chaos and blame it on the dog?
darija_ar: عقلتي كيفاش كنا كانتافقو باش نديرو روينا و سبيوها ف لكلاب ?
transl: Did you think about how we would agree to take our opinions and express them in the meeting?

eng: remember when we used to fight over who got the last slice of pizza?
darija_ar: عقلتي فاش كنا كانداربو علا شكون أياخود أخير ترف ديال پيزّا ?
transl: I thought we were deciding who gets the last slice of pizza.

eng: let's plan a day to explore the places we used to hang out as kids
darija_ar: شي نهار خلينا نكتشافو لبلايسّ لي كنا كاندورو فيهوم و حنا سخار
transl: Let's explore the places we used to visit and enjoy when we were kids.

eng: can you believe how much we've grown since those old family photos?
darija_ar: كيبان ليك شحال كبرنا من لوقت لي خدينا فيها هاد تساور ?
transl: You can see how much we have grown since the time we took this picture?

eng: do you think our parents still tease each other like they used to?
darija_ar: معارت واش واليدينا باقي كايدرانجيو بعديياتهوم و يدحكو كيما كانو قبل ?
transl: I wonder if our friends are still coming to visit us and laughing as they used to before?

eng: can you help me find a replacement for this product that i bought last time?
darija_ar: تقدر تكوف معايا شي پرودويت يعود هاداك لي شريتو أخير مرا ?
transl: Can you help me with a product return for the one I bought last time?

eng: can you assist me in finding products suitable for a specific skin type?
darija_ar: تقر تقلب معاتا علا شي پرودوييات ديال نوع واحد ديال لبشرا ?
transl: Do you mean studying for a specific type of exam?

eng: how do you always know when i need a comforting hug or a shoulder to lean on?
darija_ar: كيفاش ديما كاتعرف إمتا كانبخي تعنيقا ولا نحت راسّي علا كتفك ?
transl: How do you always know when to hug me or when to rest my head on your shoulder?

eng: could you elaborate on the training regimen that keeps you in peak physical condition?
darija_ar: تقدر تدوي لينا علا رڭيم لي كاتبعو باش تبقا فهاد لفورما ?
transl: Can you give us some tips to follow to be successful in this forum?

eng: can you discuss the lessons you've learned from past defeats that shaped your approach?
darija_ar: تقدر تدوي لينا علا دوروسّ لي تءلمتيهوم من لخسّارات لي فاتو ?
transl: Can you give us a summary of the lessons you have learned from the losses you have experienced?

eng: how do you mentally prepare for matches against rivals or historically strong opponents?
darija_ar: كيفاكك كاتوجد راسّك ماعناوييان لماتشات دد لخاريم ولا فراقي كبار تاريخييان ?
transl: How are you feeling about the upcoming matches of the national team or the big historical clubs?

eng: can you discuss your experience playing against top tier players and their strategies?
darija_ar: تقدر تعاود لينا ءلا لخيبرا ديالك دد لفراقي و لعابا لكبار ?
transl: Can you repeat what you said about your experience and your skills in football?

eng: let's make this dinner one to remember, filled with laughter and delicious food
darija_ar: نيت نتبرعوو ندحكو ناكلو ماكلا بنينا باش نبقاو عاقلين علا هاد لعشا
transl: We decided to donate, chat, and eat delicious food so that we can stay sane after this dinner.
